function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Government financial support may not reach intended recipients due to bureaucratic hurdles or delays.","Impact":"Individuals and businesses may suffer financial hardship, undermining the effectiveness of the support measures.","Mitigation":"Streamline application processes and increase administrative capacity to expedite disbursement of funds.","Technologies":"Online application portals, automated verification systems, and digital payment platforms.","People":"Individuals and businesses in need of financial support.","Owner":"Government agencies and financial institutions."},{"Description":"Increased economic support may lead to complacency in adhering to public health guidelines, leading to a higher risk of contagion.","Impact":"Higher infection rates and greater strain on healthcare resources.","Mitigation":"Provide clear communication on the importance of continued adherence to public health measures and incentivize compliance through targeted messaging and support.","Technologies":"Public health communication platforms, data analytics for targeted messaging, and mobile health apps.","People":"General population and business owners.","Owner":"Public health authorities and government communication agencies."},{"Description":"Potential increase in fraud due to the large-scale distribution of funds and economic support.","Impact":"Loss of funds, diminished trust in government initiatives, and financial harm to legitimate recipients.","Mitigation":"Implement robust verification processes, enhance oversight and reporting mechanisms, and increase public awareness of common fraud schemes.","Technologies":"Blockchain for secure transactions, AI for fraud detection, and data analytics for monitoring and reporting.","People":"Recipients of financial aid, government agencies, and financial institutions.","Owner":"Government agencies and financial institutions."}]}
